EmailTemplate.subject: Seven steps to being a successful public sector client
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
For those charged with looking after public property and estate this involves creating and sustaining affordable practice in procurement, governance and project delivery. In the first of a series of articles exploring how the public sector can continue delivering at a time of shrinking budgets and intense public scrutiny, AECOM explains how utilising best practice techniques in the management of projects are as relevant now as ever.
In Seven steps to being a successful client: a guide for the public sector we outline the importance of developing a clear vision at the outset of a project; inspiring the project team; engaging all stakeholders to create an environment of collaboration; understanding risk; adopting good governance; establishing clear performance standards; applying lessons learned â€“ both good and bad; and critically, remaining committed throughout.
